sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.KnowledgeRefQualifiers</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Functions that return reference qualifiers for various reference fields in the knowledge application.</description> <name>KnowledgeRefQualifiers</name> <script><![CDATA[var KnowledgeRefQualifiers = Class.create(); KnowledgeRefQualifiers.prototype = Object.extendsObject(KnowledgeRefQualifiersSNC,{ type: 'KnowledgeRefQualifiers' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-07-17 09:01:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>42a12a22d730210013ab49547e6103b0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>KnowledgeRefQualifiers</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Knowledge Management Core" source="com.glideapp.knowledge">e011410f6d2620100acb70b353433002</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_42a12a22d730210013ab49547e6103b0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-03-08 16:39:07</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>164</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
